titleStmt.title: The angell Gabriell, his salutation to the blessed Virgin Mary. : To the tune of, The Blazing torch.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere and W. Gilbertson,

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Glasgow University Library.
With: A godly new ballad, intituled, a dozen of points. [London] : Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere and W. Gilbertson, [between 1658 and 1664].
